message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MA, cs.NI, cs.LG. 

This paper deals with the problem of scheduling updates in an energy harvesting sensor system, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and control theory (cs.SY). The use of a Poisson process and renewal policy suggests a potential connection to stochastic processes and their applications in computer science (cs.MA). The problem of minimizing the average age of information is also related to networked systems and communication (cs.NI). Finally, the optimization aspect of the problem may also fall under machine learning and optimization (cs.LG).
